caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. A group of people on horseback emerged from a cave and entered a snowy terrain. Among them, one person stumbled upon a field of corpses arranged in various shapes in the snow. Terrified, he rushed back to report to their leader, but his companions mocked him. Following this, his companions proceeded to explore further, and then this person noticed that only their horses returned. Filled with fear, he started running back, being pursued by some individuals. He is really scared.
